Steps.Message: Update at 05:11 - We're very sorry you're still without power. Our engineers have been working hard to get you back on, but due to access issues to our substation due to a large van parked where we need to investigate we now need to send out a relief team first thing in the morning. This means that you may not receive any texts for a while. We'll let you know as soon as the team are on their way and provide you with a new estimated timeframe.

We became aware of a power cut at 02:08. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 05:11 - We're very sorry you're still without power. Our engineers have been working hard to get you back on, but due to access issues to our substation due to a large van parked where we need to investigate we now need to send out a relief team first thing in the morning. This means that you may not receive any texts for a while. We'll let you know as soon as the team are on their way and provide you with a new estimated timeframe.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
